product_name: Partners West Sasquatch Field Guide: Identifying Tracking and Sighting North America's Great Ape
long_description: Essential for serious investigators and armchair explorers of the unknown, the Sasquatch Field Guide offers all you need to know about the mysterious creature known as Sasquatch or Bigfoot.
short_description: Essential for serious investigators and armchair explorers of the unknown, the Sasquatch Field Guide offers all you need to know about the mysterious creature known as Sasquatch or Bigfoot.
